subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: After baking in the heat at Charlotte last weekend, the Nascar driver Greg Biffle is looking forward to Sunday’s STP 400 at one of his favorite tracks.
snippet: After baking in the heat at Charlotte last weekend, the Nascar driver Greg Biffle is looking forward to Sunday’s STP 400 at one of his favorite tracks.
